3: Just when the Musashi unit is about to catch you, you see a blade flashing past, slashing the Musashi in half.
The one who protected you was the Corrupted that had to run away from you, right at the beginning of this whole drama.
You see a familiar expression in the Corrupted's eyes, strong, unwavering, and reminding you of someone.
Looks like you're still seeing me as a Corrupted, Commandant.
Commandant, I am ■■, here awaiting your command.
Shouldn't you have run away, Lucia? Why are you still here?
I'm only here to help rescue Commandant, just like everyone else.

In that case, I would still be seen as a Corrupted and got attacked, just like before.
Even if the others recognized me, Commandant's perception would still have been compromised and would likely give an order to attack.

I never thought that could shock my M.I.N.D. so much.
Then—
But there's one thing that I'm always certain.
It doesn't matter what Commandant sees me as, because I only have one thing to do, right from the beginning.

You...!

Tch...
Bloody Cerberus! You're not going to walk away easily!
Even if Cerberus has privileges, you can't do whatever you want... You will face punishment.

Are you trying to run away?!
Yeah, obviously. One member alone can't make a Cerberus.
The ground is shaking... Is she trying to blow up the mansion?
That's the end of the April Fool's fun. I will make you pay for this, Gray Raven. And everyone else...
